Everyday there is new reports of prisoner's on Facebook boasting about what they have done, what they are going to do and putting victims and their families through hell.

A few prisoners have admitted spending up to 20hrs a week on Facebook via iPhone's and other mobile devices however if they broke the law then surely they relinquished their rights to such privileges?

Mobile phone blockers should be installed in every single prison across the UK to prevent criminals from hounding society from behind bars, they seem to forget, along with the judges that they took someone else's rights away.
